languages.text: "Зреть смерть мира было сродни откровению. Я возношу благодарность Неумирающему за возможность свидетельствовать сие".

traits.locale_text: "Зреть смерть мира было сродни откровению. Я возношу благодарность Неумирающему за возможность свидетельствовать сие".

languages.text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
languages.original_text: "Зреть смерть мира было сродни откровению. Я возношу благодарность Неумирающему за возможность свидетельствовать сие".

traits.locale_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
"To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
"To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
"To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
"To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."

languages.text: «Presenciar la muerte de un mundo ha sido revelador. Le agradezco al Inmortal haber tenido la oportunidad de hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."

languages.text: 「惑星の死を目の当たりにすることは、さながら啓示のようでした。立ち会える機会を与えられたことについて、不死の者へ感謝を捧げます」
languages.original_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."

languages.text: “目睹整个世界的死亡，就如同某种启示一般。我要感谢不死之神给了我这个见证的机会。”
languages.original_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."

languages.text: "Den Tod einer Welt zu erleben, kam einer Offenbarung gleich. Ich danke dem Todlosen für die Chance, dabei gewesen zu sein."
languages.original_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."

languages.text: « Assister à la mort d'un monde s'est apparenté à une révélation. Je remercie l'Immortel de m'avoir donné la chance d'en être témoin. »
languages.original_text: "To behold the death of a world was akin to a revelation. I give thanks to the Undying One for the chance to bear witness."
